text: Sara Kaljuvee (born February 7, 1993) is a Canadian rugby sevens player. She won a gold medal at the 2015 Pan American Games as a member of the Canada women's national rugby sevens team. In 2016, she was also named to Canada's first ever women's rugby sevens Olympic Team (travelling alt.) Kaljuvee was a part of the first ever Commonwealth Games tournament in 2018. title: Sara Kaljuvee
